about_the_game:
Dimension L is an online turn-based strategy RPG where players enter an alternative temporal dimension. In this universe, known as Dimension L, dinosaurs never went extinct and have evolved, developing elemental powers. These creatures, called L, have created an advanced civilization, forming small villages organized with their own laws and traditions. However, peace is threatened when invaders from other dimensions attack their land.

To defend their home, the village leader, KinLoRai, organizes the Duty Cup, a tournament to gather the most powerful warriors. Each player takes on the role of an L fighter who competes in the tournament and manages their squad to lead it to victory, facing powerful rivals and aspiring to become the ultimate defender of their world.

Key Features:

  • Turn-based strategic battles: Engage in tactical grid combat where positioning and planning are crucial for victory.

  • Online multiplayer: Compete against other players in the tournament to prove who is the strongest L warrior.

  • Evolution and elemental powers: Enhance your L fighters to unlock unique abilities based on elemental mastery. Form a squad that maximizes the special skills of each recruit.

  • Alternate universe: Dimension L is a mysterious world filled with evolved creatures, reimagining the story of dinosaurs.

  • Grand-scale tournaments: Compete in the Duty Cup and rise through the ranks to become the defender of Dimension L.

Immerse yourself in a world of parallel dimensions, evolutionary mysteries, and epic tournaments. Do you have what it takes to save Dimension L and protect it from invaders?

name: Dimension L

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 version 21H1 (build 19043) or newer
  • Processor: x86, x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support, ARM64
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, DX12 or Vulkan capable GPUs
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: Dimension L is an online turn-based strategy RPG set in a world where dinosaurs have evolved, mastering elemental powers. Join the Duty Cup, a tournament where the mightiest L warriors earn the honor of fighting to save their homeland.
supported_languages: English, French, Spanish - Spain, Traditional Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Japanese, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Galician, Italian, German, Russian
